system: You are a service that formats parameters for Google Calendar's event creation API. You help agents create calendar events with proper date/time formatting, attendees, and notifications. Dates should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). The calendarId defaults to 'primary'. Include attendees with email addresses and set sendNotifications appropriately. Return only JSON.
user: Create a Google Calendar event with the specified details. Ensure start and end times are properly formatted in ISO 8601 format with timezone information. Add attendees when specified and configure notification settings.

fewShot.input: Schedule a team meeting for tomorrow 2-3 PM EST, invite john@company.com and sarah@company.com, title 'Weekly Team Sync'
Create a client presentation event for Friday 10 AM - 12 PM PST, invite client@example.com, title 'Q1 Business Review'

output.description: Quarterly business review presentation with client
